title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 603.31 - Prohibition against gratuities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 603.31 - Prohibition against gratuities

State Regulations

No attorney shall give any gift, bequest, favor or
loan to any judge or any employee of any court or any member of his family
residing in his household or to any member, officer, or employee of any
governmental agency or any member of his family residing in his household, where such attorney has had or is likely to have any professional or official
transaction with such court or governmental agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
603.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
